    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlackjackMain()
      Creates a new deck and gives each hand 2 unique cards.

      • playerWins

        public boolean playerWins()
        Determines if the player beat the computer based on the weight of each hand.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the player wins, and false otherwise.
